body: Won't protobufs be out of the build entirely by 0.19?

> Won't protobufs be out of the build entirely by 0.19?

Ah! Is it no longer a dependency?
Not yet, but AFAIK thats the plan.

@dongcarl It's still required. `0.18.0` introduced a [flag](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/configure.ac#L218) to allow disabling `BIP70` support (still enabled by default). I've opened #15584 to make __disabling__ BIP70 support the default for `0.19.0`. I assume we'll be able to remove it entirely (and thus the protobuf dependency) in `0.20.0`.
Ah okay. Well I guess this change will be relevant for a little bit at least :-)

<!--a722867cd34abeea1fadc8d60700f111-->
